description: This file implements an interactive SQLite database shell with commands for listing tables, showing schemas, describing tables, executing queries, and handling user input in a command-line interface.

methods.name: print_help
methods.description: Prints help information about available shell commands.

methods.name: list_tables
methods.description: Lists all tables in the connected SQLite database.

methods.name: show_schema
methods.description: Shows CREATE statements for tables, either all or a specific one.

methods.name: describe_table
methods.description: Displays the structure of a specified table.

methods.name: execute_query
methods.description: Executes a SQL query and displays results or affected rows.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that runs the interactive shell loop, handling user input and executing commands.
